typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RCID as string ('1,2'),
	SQNR as string ('3,8'),
	TDNR as string ('11,15'),
	CDGT as string ('26,1'),
	TCNR as string ('27,15')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FixedTCN1
FixedTCN1 derive(RCID = substring(Column_1,1,2),
		SQNR = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		TDNR = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		CDGT = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		TCNR = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		TCND = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> MapFields1
MapFields1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TCN1CSV
